name: Ufo Air Hockey
description:
Air Hockey. In space. With power-ups!

Ufo Air Hockey is an exciting, air hockey inspired game, set in space that supports single player and local multiplayer.

• Play solo or with a friend in the same device.
• Experience thrilling, fast paced gameplay.
• Use power-ups to grow your saucer, add a goalie, add extra pucks or change the puck material to rubber.
• A physics engine is used for realistic collisions and puck behavior.

Each player controls a flying saucer by taping the screen on their side of the field or by dragging the saucer around. Push the puck to your opponent's goal to score.

Note: The game was desinged for multitouch devices but you can player the 1-player mode with the mouse.

If you want to intall the game for offline play on your mobile device home screen, click this link and then add it to your home screen from your browser menu.
